name: Revolution Motors
tag_list: auto-repair, automotive-service, brake-shop, diesel-repair, oil-changes, tire-shop
overview:
Revolution Motors - Expert automotive service shop in Edmonton, Alberta. Full service auto repair, car repairs, tires, diesel repairs, brakes, oil changes, auto body, used vehicle sales and more!

Revolution Motors Inc. has been serving the city of Edmonton and it’s surrounding area’s since 2007. At Revolution Motors, our full service automotive repair shop specializes in diesel repair and mechanical and electrical diagnostics. Whether it’s routine maintenance or detailed complex repairs we take pride in ensuring that your vehicle is performing at it’s best! All of our automotive services include a one year warranty on parts and labour and a one year roadside assistance that is included on select parts.
